It does not matter what Champica did or does. What he says here is correct. Mahinda was a good leader. We should be thankful for him for his actions before 2010. He should be considered as a hero. However, it is clear that he is not thinking clearly now. This should not be surprising: anybody who has dealt with an elderly parent or a relative would know that there thinking becomes a bit misty with age. This is not something to be ashamed of or surprised. Also, it should not be an insult. It is just the reality.  Also, I am not saying that Mahinda is crazy because he is old.
